name: Observation Haki
text: Main You may attach 1 active DON!! card to 1 of your [Silvers Rayleigh]: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and reveal up to 1 red Event card or up to 1 cost 3 or greater Character card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
